Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Minuet of Forest#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Barinade#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #a Goron Tunic#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.
